creator: shanker@nuasis.com
text:
Ant 1.5.1 build fails with an "out of memory error", but I am unable to bump 
up the maximum heap memory using the maxmemory attribute for <signjar> task.

This is an absolute showstopper for the build process right now. I cannot 
update to the newer version right now. Another odd thing: I am unable to find 
the documentation for ANT 1.5.1 anywhere online.

-Shanker

creator: conor@apache.org
text:
This support was added in Ant 1.5.2. If you cannot upgrade to Ant 1.6, you
should be able to upgrade to Ant 1.5.2, with little impact.

The documentation for Ant 1.5.1 is not online - a full copy is inlcuded in the
Ant 1.5.1 download.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 1284 ***
